hadiths.text: This hadith has been narrated by Qatada with the same chain of transmitters in these words:He (the Messenger of Allah) said: Allah divided the Qur'an into three parts, and he made:" Say: He, Allah is One." one part out of the (three) parts of the Qur'an

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ قِرَاءَةِ { قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ}
chapter.eng-name: The virtue of reciting Qul Huwa Allahu Ahad
